Data_CSV Class¶

This class provides information about loaded data.

class remote.client.data_CSV.Data_CSV(data, last_modified, file_name)[source]¶

Store information about loaded data, last modified date and name of the file. To access the properties of the class access variables directly.

Example:

Access data about player/team:

$ loaded = Data_CSV(data, last_modified, file_name)
$ loaded.player_data

Acceess information about date of the data:

$ loaded = Data_CSV(data, last_modified, file_name)
$ loaded.last_modified

Access information about file name:

$ loaded = Data_CSV(data, last_modified, file_name)
$ loaded.file_name
Parameters:
  • data – Pandas dataframe containing loaded values
  • last_modified – String with time when data was downloaded to the server
  • file_name – Name of the loaded file
save_stats(path)[source]¶

Saves loaded dataframe to given path.

Parameters:path – Full path to saved dataframe, along with all directories and file name ending in .csv.
